__TOC__

This is the home of the Ohio Ubucon.

When: Friday, September 10, 10am - 5:20pm

Where: Room (?) Ohio Linux Fest (<nowiki>[[http://ohiolinux.org/directions.html|directions]]</nowiki>), Columbus, OH

Who: Anyone who's interested.

Contact: Ubuntu Ohio LoCo and <nowiki>[[http://www.google.com/recaptcha/mailhide/d?k=01PTG4p1jTcjXTnPQ1EAocGQ==&c=N5Q7Eo6JaQboSdKrUFyNBaegwk3920GuobvaHDNCdQ8=|William Chambers]]</nowiki>
